```{r}
#3
input <- as.integer(readline(prompt = "Enter a number: "))

prev <- 0
curr <- 1

print(curr)

repeat {
  next_num <- prev + curr
  if (next_num > 500) {
    break
  }
  print(next_num)
  prev <- curr
  curr <- next_num
}
```

```{r}
ImportedDataSet <- read.csv(file =  "/cloud/project/worksheet#4/ShoeSizeHeightGender.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")

View(ImportedDataSet)

head(ImportedDataSet, 6)


Fsubset <- ImportedDataSet(ImportedDataSet, gender == "F")
View(Fsubset)

MSubset <- ImportedDataSet(ImportedDataSet, Gender == "M")
View(MSubset)


gendCount <- c(male = MSubset, female = Fsubset)

barplot(gendCount, main = "Numbers of Male and Female",
         xlab = "Gender", ylab = "Numbers", col = c("purple", "magenta"),
         legend.text = TRUE)
legend("topright", legend = names(gendCount), fill = c("purple", "magenta"))


```
